body:
Your comment puzzles me.  Christianity is its own thing with its own ideas... it doesn't need conservative thought at all incorporated into it.... and conservative thought is absent of Christianity.

Christianity in its pure form is an anarchist movement that was meant to topple the empires of the world... In the eyes of Romans, Jews, Greeks, it was highly unorthodox. It still can bee,but statist, authoritarian, right-winged mindset took it over... established hierarchies within the church, used it as a tool to pursue political means.

Your comment puzzles me. Christianity is its own thing with its own ideas... it doesn't need conservative thought at all incorporated into it.... and conservative thought is absent of Christianity.

body: Ronald Reagan was okay. The Republican party could by no means be considered fascist until suddenly a year ago when they flip flopped their entire ideology except their "morals". Prior to that they always championed limited government and only allied with traditionalists because the Democrats wanted (and still want) to erase their way of life.

Prior to that they always championed limited government and only allied with traditionalists because the Democrats wanted (and still want) to erase their way of life.

body: Conservatives are *supposed* to be conserving the Constitution, rights, etc. That is not for or against Christianity although it did have a lot of Christian support, but politics was separate aside from Democrats trying to destroy Christianity. Conservatives aren't supposed to be "conserving" traditions by forcing them on everyone with governmental power, which is completely against their original ideology. Sometime last year either they suddenly changed their minds or the timeline got screwed up. And that's when all these fake Christian movements merged with them. Progressives have pretty much stayed the same, although the main difference is now morals instead of ideology since they have both now agreed on a strong, totalitarian state that controls every aspect of peoples' lives and crushes dissent and nonconformity.
body_html: Conservatives are supposed to be conserving the Constitution, rights, etc. That is not for or against Christianity although it did have a lot of Christian support, but politics was separate aside from Democrats trying to destroy Christianity. Conservatives aren't supposed to be "conserving" traditions by forcing them on everyone with governmental power, which is completely against their original ideology. Sometime last year either they suddenly changed their minds or the timeline got screwed up. And that's when all these fake Christian movements merged with them. Progressives have pretty much stayed the same, although the main difference is now morals instead of ideology since they have both now agreed on a strong, totalitarian state that controls every aspect of peoples' lives and crushes dissent and nonconformity.

guild.description: Got a burning unpopular opinion you want to share? Spark some discussions!
guild.description_html: Got a burning unpopular opinion you want to share? Spark some discussions!
guild.name: UnpopularOpinion

parent.body:
Your comment puzzles me.  Christianity is its own thing with its own ideas... it doesn't need conservative thought at all incorporated into it.... and conservative thought is absent of Christianity.

Christianity in its pure form is an anarchist movement that was meant to topple the empires of the world... In the eyes of Romans, Jews, Greeks, it was highly unorthodox. It still can bee,but statist, authoritarian, right-winged mindset took it over... established hierarchies within the church, used it as a tool to pursue political means.
parent.body_html:
Your comment puzzles me. Christianity is its own thing with its own ideas... it doesn't need conservative thought at all incorporated into it.... and conservative thought is absent of Christianity.

Christianity in its pure form is an anarchist movement that was meant to topple the empires of the world... In the eyes of Romans, Jews, Greeks, it was highly unorthodox. It still can bee,but statist, authoritarian, right-winged mindset took it over... established hierarchies within the church, used it as a tool to pursue political means.

body:
Conservativism was never about limited government

It supports correct government regardless of size

The republicans are not fascist. If they were the world would be much better off and leftism would be extinct
body_html:
Conservativism was never about limited government

It supports correct government regardless of size

The republicans are not fascist. If they were the world would be much better off and leftism would be extinct

parent.body: Ronald Reagan was okay. The Republican party could by no means be considered fascist until suddenly a year ago when they flip flopped their entire ideology except their "morals". Prior to that they always championed limited government and only allied with traditionalists because the Democrats wanted (and still want) to erase their way of life.
parent.body_html: Ronald Reagan was okay. The Republican party could by no means be considered fascist until suddenly a year ago when they flip flopped their entire ideology except their "morals". Prior to that they always championed limited government and only allied with traditionalists because the Democrats wanted (and still want) to erase their way of life.
